name: The Lost Artifact
description:
The Lost Artifact is a fantasy ARPG  in which you'll play as a heroic warrior and dive deep into a treacherous volcanic fortress to retrieve a sacred artifact. You'll level up and customize your character to defeat your foes in a multitude of ways!

Game Tips:

E to open Ability Tree or press the indicator on the right of the hotbar

R to open the Stat Window or press the indicator on the right on the hotbar

Use the Vendor at camp!

ESC to pause
